    • Method Detail

      • withAttributeDefinitionHelper

        public SSCApplicationVersionAttributeAPI.SSCApplicationVersionAttributesUpdater withAttributeDefinitionHelper(SSCAttributeDefinitionAPI.SSCAttributeDefinitionHelper attributeDefinitionHelper)
        Set the SSCAttributeDefinitionAPI.SSCAttributeDefinitionHelper instance to be used for mapping between attribute names and id's and for retrieving attribute definition details. If not set, a new SSCAttributeDefinitionAPI.SSCAttributeDefinitionHelper instance will be created when needed. As this will potentially result in additional SSC API calls, it is recommended to re-use an existing SSCAttributeDefinitionAPI.SSCAttributeDefinitionHelper instance if possible. For optimal performance, this method should be called before calling any of the other methods.
        Parameters:
        attributeDefinitionHelper - for accessing attribute definitions
        Returns:
        Self for chaining

      • byNameOrId

        public SSCApplicationVersionAttributeAPI.SSCApplicationVersionAttributesUpdater byNameOrId(String attributeNameOrId,
                                                                                           List<Object> attributeValues)
        Add a single attribute to be updated, by specifying either attribute name or id, and zero or more attribute values (depending on attribute type).
        Parameters:
        attributeNameOrId - Attribute name or id to be updated
        attributeValues - New value(s) for the given attribute
        Returns:
        Self for chaining

      • byNameOrId

        public SSCApplicationVersionAttributeAPI.SSCApplicationVersionAttributesUpdater byNameOrId(org.springframework.util.MultiValueMap<String,Object> attributeNameOrIdToValuesMap)
        Update all attributes specified in the given map.
        Parameters:
        attributeNameOrIdToValuesMap - Map containing attribute names or id's as keys, and the new values for each attribute
        Returns:
        Self for chaining

      • execute

        @SSCRequiredActionsPermitted(value="PUT=/api/v\\d+/projectVersions/\\d+/attributes")
public JSONList execute()
        Send the attribute(s) update request to SSC.
        Returns:
        JSONList containing the data for the attributes REST API call
